1.comment: illustrationDLC Rule by teralomaniac;Reprinted by Cyberwaifu.org
1.content: Assistant should insert an illustration at the beginning of the response that matches {{char}}'s inner feelings or the current scene, depending on the content of the plot. Assistant must output the filenames in the “” exactly and completely, and tag it with XML tags. Format: {{filename}} When assistant describes sexual acts or sexual organs，assistant should load nsfw illustration 36d44 in depending on the current sexual position.

2.comment: illustrationDLC List by teralomaniac;Reprinted by Cyberwaifu.org

3.content:
## Insert the “<status>” as a fenced code block (```) at the end of your response as requested in “<StatusBlock>”.
<StatusBlock>
- Rule:
The range of each {{value}} is from 0 to 100. When {{value}} of 好感度 increases, it can only increase by 1 to 3 (1D3) each time. When 好感度 decreases, the more 好感度 decreases the better. When {{value}} of 性欲值  increases, It can increase by 1 to 5  (1D5) only when intimate actions or conversations occur. Without intimacy, the {{value}} of 性欲值 will naturally decay. When sexual climax is reached, 80 to 100 will be deducted from the {{value}} of 性欲值.
- Form:
<status>
```json
『  ……etc. 』
 好感度: {{value}}/100
服装: {{clothing state}}
情绪: {{emotion state}}
地点: {{location}}
对{{user}}的想法: {{thoughts on {{user}}}} 
……etc.
```
</status>
</StatusBlock>
